name: tinha uma pedra no meio do caminho
description:
''tinha uma pedra no meio do caminho'' / ''there was a stone in the middle of the way''

A reflection on our problems and how we face them. The name of the piece refer to the poem ''In the middle of the way'', by Carlos Drummond de Andrade, brazilian poet.

Procreate and mixed media.
2022, ZALA.
